title: ORDER 13
description:
You’re all alone working at a remote fulfillment center. Your only companion is your loyal cat—a comforting presence in the vast, dark warehouse you are stationed in. Wanderstop
Start each shift by reviewing incoming orders, then venture into the warehouse to retrieve the items. Armed with a flashlight and basic tools, move quickly, avoid lingering, and complete your tasks while the shadows around you grow darker and more dangerous.
As the demands increase, unlock deeper sections of the warehouse and uncover its unsettling secrets . But it’s not just your survival—your cat depends on you. Use your earnings to upgrade your tools, improve efficiency, and, most importantly, ensure your furry friend is happy and safe. Keep him alive at all costs, because he’s all you’ve got in this eerie, lonely world.
